thread.title: Lakshmi Rai excited about dancing with Pawan Kalyan
thread.title_full: Lakshmi Rai excited about dancing with Pawan Kalyan - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Lakshmi Rai excited about dancing with Pawan Kalyan
text: Sharing screen space with Powerstar Pawan Kalyan is a dream for any actress. Luckily, gorgeous girl Lakshmi Rai bagged a plum role in Pawan Kalyan's upcoming action entertainer, Sardaar Gabbar Singh. She is all excited to join the shoot, which will commence from tomorrow in Ramanaidu Studios. An item song will be shot between Pawan Kalyan and Lakshmi Rai. Directed by Bobby, the film has Kajal Aggarwal as the female lead. Devi Sri Prasad is scoring the music for the film.
